# 2023
## _Allium cepa_ RAD-seq dataset reanalysis

Bioinformatic pipeline testing for genotyping of multiple individuals via RAD-seq. A full demonstration of the code used in each step is aimed at. Some analyses of the results may be showcased. The pipeline has heavy use of STACKS.

You can [click here](allium_cepa_reanalysis.qmd) to check it out
